year_wise.4th_year: 31.5 credits with option for 6-month industry project

year_wise.2nd_year: 30 credits with option for 1-year research project

phd.name: Ph.D in Engineering
phd.admission: Through advertisement and open competition, twice a year
phd.eligibility: Candidates from various Engineering and Science backgrounds/disciplines

program_education_objectives: To impart the adequate fundamental knowledge in the chemical engineering domain.
Application of chemical engineering knowledge in design, research, innovation, industrial practices and societal development.
To impart adequate knowledge for the product development utilizing the available resources in the North-east part of India.
To enhance the skill of problem solving and employability, time and trace management, engagement in team work.
program_specific_outcomes: The graduated students will be employable to chemical and other allied industries by acquiring the knowledge to identify, analyze, control and solve the industrial, environmental and management problems.
The students will be able to carry forward higher studies and research on multi-disciplinary fields.
The students will be able to design chemical equipment, plants, development of products and also to carry out entrepreneurship.
